message.body: If i send you a text message in someone elses language and some description youd be able to detect cf
Try me! I love that.
Her voice is shot- she screams in a band. She covers both of our eyes when we're close. But across a room, she stares back at me,holds eye contact long.
Never talks, not a word when we're alone. Has sex in her sleep. Cutting, not eating, etc adolescent. She drinks a lot, never seems drunk.
I asked her if we could talk today and she responded:
Were having pract right now for the twac performance. Id like to talk too
Her sentences are all like that. Clear. Launches. Except sometimes really abstract and minimal and she wont,cant say more. A couple times she cried quiet
ly in my chest. But dry.
Water? I also hear grief and longing (metal).
Hmmmmmm
What do you think?
My initial thought was Wood but that changed as you kept texting.
I thought wood. But too dry and breakable. So no. Doesnt talk or need publically like earth. But mbe earth pathology. Shes so psychic. I thought metal.
Water too,because she waits in this way. But strange how awkward when were alone + silent
Maybe wood metal or metal wood,she needs ids
Theres a few people that really need ids here
The angst I can't tell where it's from which I think would make a difference.
I dont actually think water, second thought. Shes intense but bolty and fragile
The more I learn the less I know.
Same!
Not angst-violence
Makes you cave at the middle she pierces

I thinks ex Jason is water earth and he is bolty and fragile. I talked to him tonight and he said he actually feels better when other people fall apart. Which was bad because when I felt capable he felt unsteady.
Violence makes me think wood. I said angst bc there seems to be a sense of gritting the teeth and not knowing what to do next. Hence violence.
Aha, yes
Interesante bout xJ. The moving/still vibe. Fear or something
That makes me hunk of wood controlling the tendons. It's my within and when I get angry I feel jittery.

When I moved we had to move out this huge couch that was there when I moved in. It got jammed in the stairwell and was so heavy and disgusting I just started crying.he got a saw and hacked the legs off and we got it out. He said he felt better when I fell
He also complained I was a wiggly cuddler. Haha! I thought he was metal but that was soooo wrong. He's very judgmental and was cut off while we dates so I mistook that for terrible metal cf.
Hmmmmm thanks for sharing that
He also said over and over again "I don't feel safe with you." Water!!!
